name: Rene Volker
description: I am a very honest sincere person with a huge loving heart. I have a very soft heart and I am a very feeling person. I am very sensitive and a very gentle person. I am a very deep person and thinker.I am a hopeless romantic and believe in true love. I am a very heart felt person. I am the kind of person that once I am a friend I am always a true friend. I am a very loving affectionate person. I love hugs and terms of endurment. I am a very creative person. I love writing and art. Also computers, music, very out going and so much more. I have many interests. I love anything to do with the ocean. I love the ocean and beautiful sunsets. Especially over the ocean. I love nature and animals. I love the rain, the stars and the simplest things in life are my favorite. I am a very serious person
